publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3205 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Treatment of Office or Body as Specified Authority) Order 2005â€”That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 (Treatment of Office or Body as Specified Authority) Order 2005 be approved.Supported by: George Lyon*
